text: Toto bamala okhukora mubukhayi balia ababoola mbu Isah- omubakhwa Omwana wa Mariam ni Nyasaye. Omubakhwa yaboola mbu; ‘‘Enywe Abana ba Israili mulaame Nyasaye Omulesi wanje nende Omulesi wenyu, Toto ulia otsokaasia Nyasaye, yamala okhwimwa mwikulu ne eshimenyo shiaye ni mumulilo, ne ababii shibalinyoola ubakhoonya tawe.’’
